alert.note: Alert for Bossier (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 11 at 7:34AM CDT until May 11 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Arkansas and northwest Louisiana, including the following counties and parishes, in southwest Arkansas, Columbia and Lafayette. In northwest Louisiana, Bossier and Webster. * WHEN...Until 1045 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 734 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Springhill, Cullen, Sarepta, Taylor, Welcome and State Line. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
